bibl.title: Gladys Fredrika Fuson v. Territory of Washington. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States

div1.p: Pet Exhibit 2
IN THE SUPERIOR COURT OF THE UNITED STATES OF WASHINGTON KING COUNTY
H.W.Fuson Plaintiff, vs. Gladys Fuson Defendant,}
No.118393 ORDER

In open Court this 20th day of October 1916 the above entitled matter coming on for argument and hearing on the application of the Defendant for an order to show cause heretofore issued here in for an allowance to the defendant for suit money and alimony pendete lite in this action, Defendant appearing by P.H.Wilson her Attorney and the Defendant H.W.Fuson appearing in person and also by his attorney T.R.Horner, the Court having considered the matter and being duly advised, having heard the argument of Counsel and the statement of the Paintiff,

IT IS THERFORE ORDERED BY THE COURT, that the Plaintiff H.W.Fuson immediatley pay into Court or the registry thereof the sum of Four Dollars as suit money for expenses already incurred and also the further sum of Twelve & 50/100 Dollars as alimony pendent lite, and also the sum of Twelve & 50/100 Dollars upon his next paydayto wit Oct 25" 1916 and the further sum of Twelve Dollars & 50/100 semi montly thereafter, during the pendendency of this action as and for the support of the Defendant during the pendency of said action.
By The Court,
Boyd J Tallemer Judge
In the Superior Court of the State of Washington for the Couty of King
State of Washington County of King}ss
HW Fuson Plaintiff vs. Gladys Fuson Defendant}

I, W. K. SICKELS, County Clerk of King County, and ex-officio clerk of the Superior Court of the State of Washington for the County of King do hereby certify that I have compared the foregoing copy with the original Order in the above entitled cause as the same appears on file in my office and the same is true and perfect transcript of said original and of the whole therof.
Witness my hand and the seal of the said Superior Court, at my office in Seattle,this 24 day of Oct 1916
WK Sickels Clerk
By O.S. Bruces Deputy
IN THE SUPERIOR COURT of the State of Washington For the County of King
Fuson Plantiff vs. Fuson Defendant
Certified Copy of Order
PH Wilson Attorney for Deft Seattle, Washington
